name: Unstable Christmas
description:
Game developed for the 49 LudumDare GameJam 2021 (Theme:"Unstable").

Equipe:

  1. Beda (Developer)
  2. Priscila (Developer)
  3. Eduarda (2D illustration, design UX e UI)
  4. Larissa (2D animation )
  5. Natália (Ost)

Unstable Christmas is a top down isometric puzzle game, near the christmas day a bad cookie invade the Santa Claus gift factory and has stolen some presents , as a good elf, your mission is to retrieve all the stolen presents from this bad guy, but be carful! The ice path has many hiden bombs throuth the way, mmemorize where are the presents and don't step into the unstable ice.
